creator: sf@coquio.org
text:
I can't build the jk connector on a sparc linux machine, ant fails with the message:
BUILDIR/jk/build.xml:383 Class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.condition.Not
doesn't support the nested "isset" element

I've tried commenting this out (and the one on line 389) but the build script is
expected messages so fails anyway after that

tried with a couple of jdk's 1.4.1 and 1.3.1 (both Blackdown)
linux version is Debian running a 2.4.18 kernel

creator: hgomez@apache.org
text:
Which ant version did you have ?

Could you tried with 1.5.1 ?

creator: roshan@net-yan.com
text:
I just downloaded 1.4.1 but got the same error.. but on line 389. I have not 
changed anything except follow instructions..

I tried this with Ant 1.5 (can't find 1.5.1 on the released versions), but now 
I get the following error...  there is no such file (tomcat-coyote.jar) on my 
pc.

I'm using windows XP with:
JDK - j2sdk1.4.1_01
Tomcat - jakarta-tomcat-4.0.6
Ant - jakarta-ant-1.5
Tomcat Connectors - jakarta-tomcat-connectors-4.0.6-src


Error message is as follows:

F:\jakarta-tomcat-connectors-4.0.6-src\jk>ant
Buildfile: build.xml

detect:
     [echo] -------- jakarta-tomcat-connectors --------

guess_catalina40:

guess_catalina41:

cpath:

prepare:

BUILD FAILED
file:F:/jakarta-tomcat-connectors-4.0.6-src/jk/build.xml:110: Warning: Could 
not
 find file F:\jakarta-tomcat-connectors-4.0.6-src\coyote\build\lib\tomcat-
coyote
.jar to copy.

Total time: 1 second
creator: roshan@net-yan.com

text:
Use the main build file for tomcat. There are ordering issues.
We may fix it later.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
